means.word_mean: 1. an adherent of the teachings of Socinus; a Christian who rejects the divinity of Christ and the Trinity and original sin; influenced the development of Unitarian theology

auth_sentence.content: Being...discovered to be a rampant Socinian, he was discharged of employment.
